reviewText: "The courageous men and women who practice COMBAT MEDICINE perform the most perilous duty on the battlefield. As war engineers and biochemists unleash ever more ingenious ways to kill, the combat medic races the clock to save the wounded. Learn how stunning advances in training, drugs and technology have drastically reduced the death rate of hospitalized soldiers between World Wars I and II - and continue to save lives." Hosted and narrated by George C. Scott.
